name: breldm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: sylbi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1))
stmt.pretty: sylbi(c0[c1]c2, c0 ∈ dom(c1), < c0, c2 > ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))

body.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)

comment: Membership of first of a binary relation in a domain. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-1995.)
